  1. Docs
  2. Installation

Installation¶

Python3+ is required for usage with TBApi. To install Python3+ and PIP for your system, visit the Python Website.

Once Python is installed, the library can be installed or updated by running:

pip install --upgrade tbapi

The library can then be easily imported and used within your projects.

Usage¶

The TBApi Library can be imported simply by calling:

import tbapi

From there, you must create a Parser object that allows you to interact with The Blue Alliance’s API servers. You can generate an API key by visiting TBA Account Settings.

parser = tbapi.Parser(api_key)

This Parser object can then be used to gather data from The Blue Alliance API. Parser methods are available for every API call and can be found below.

Parser¶

class tbapi.Parser(api_key, *, cache=True, force_cache=False, log_cache=False, cache_multiplier=1)¶

TBA Parser Class: Routes API requests and handles caching. Requires v3 API Key from TBA.

pull_response_json(path, *, force_new=False, force_cache=False, log_cache=False)¶

Pull the JSON response to a given path from the TBA API servers or the response cache.

get_status(*, force_new=False, force_cache=False, log_cache=False)¶

Status: the Status of The Blue Alliance’s API and its Apps.

get_team_list(*, page=None, year=None, force_new=False, force_cache=False, log_cache=False)¶

DataList: a list of Team objects. ‘page’ and ‘year’ values optional.

get_team_key_list(*, page=None, year=None, force_new=False, force_cache=False, log_cache=False)¶

Get a list of team keys. ‘page’ and ‘year’ values optional.

get_team(team_identifier, *, force_new=False, force_cache=False, log_cache=False)¶

Team: Get a single team, by ‘team_key’ or ‘team_number’.

get_team_years_participated(team_identifier, *, force_new=False, force_cache=False, log_cache=False)¶

list: a list containing the years in which a given team has participated.

get_team_districts(team_identifier, *, force_new=False, force_cache=False, log_cache=False)¶

DataList: a list of District objects in which the given team has competed in.

get_team_robots(team_identifier, *, force_new=False, force_cache=False, log_cache=False)¶

DataList: a list of Robot objects built and operated by a given team.

get_team_social_media(team_identifier, *, force_new=False, force_cache=False, log_cache=False)¶

DataList: a list of Media objects (Social Media Prescenses) operated by a given team.

Alias: get_team_social

get_team_events(team_identifier, year=None, *, force_new=False, force_cache=False, log_cache=False)¶

DataList: a list of Event objects attended by a given team.

get_team_event_matches(team_identifier, event_key, *, force_new=False, force_cache=False, log_cache=False)¶

DataList: a list of Match objects played by a given Team at a given Event.

get_team_event_awards(team_identifier, event_key, *, force_new=False, force_cache=False, log_cache=False)¶

DataList: a list of Award objects presented to a given Team at a given Event.

get_team_event_status(team_identifier, event_key, *, force_new=False, force_cache=False, log_cache=False)¶

Get information about the status of a given team at a given event.

get_team_awards(team_identifier, year=None, *, force_new=False, force_cache=False, log_cache=False)¶

DataList: a list of Award objects presented to a given Team throughout their History.

get_team_matches(team_identifier, year=None, *, force_new=False, force_cache=False, log_cache=False)¶

DataList: a list of Match objects played by a given Team throughout their History

get_team_media(team_identifier, year=None, *, force_new=False, force_cache=False, log_cache=False)¶

DataList: a list of Media objects provided by a given Team throughout their History

get_event_list(year=None, *, force_new=False, force_cache=False, log_cache=False)¶

DataList: Get a list of Event objects.

get_event(event_key, *, force_new=False, force_cache=False, log_cache=False)¶

Event: Get a single event by it’s event_key.

Data Classes¶

Individual Data Classes that represent certain types of data.

Data List¶

A modified List including filter support and access to the raw JSON arrays represented.

class tbapi.DataList(data_list, json_array, *args, **kwargs)¶

List-Extension used for storing data objects with extra information.

filter(attr_name, attr_value)¶

Filter the stored objects by a given attribute with a given value.

Returns new DataList containing only Data Objects with attribute attr_name containing attr_value.

raw¶

Returns the raw JSON array used to create the DataList object and it’s contained Data objects.

Alias: json_array (modifiable dictionary available for concatenation or modification)

Data¶

class tbapi.Data(json_array, parser, options=None)¶

Basic Data Class, extended with attributes for other Data Models.

All Data objects are extensions of the dict class, meaning that the raw JSON used to create these objects can be obtained by treating the object as a dictionary rather than an object.

Data objects maintain a reference to the Parser object that created them in order to live pull further information later on down the road.

Warning

When treating Data objects as dictionaries, all data is returned “as-is” by TBA. No futher processing is done to transform second-level dictionaries into their own Data objects.

Status¶

class tbapi.Status(json_array, parser, options=None)¶

Status Data Class: Represents the Status of The Blue Alliance API v3 and it’s associated applications.

android¶

App: Android App Status information.

ios¶

App: iOS App Status Information

current_season¶

The Current FIRST Robotics Competition Season.

max_season¶

The maximum FIRST Robotics Competition Season.

is_datafeed_down¶

A Boolean representing whether or not the datafeed is down.

down_events¶

A raw JSON array representing events that are currently down.

App¶

class tbapi.App(json_array, parser, options=None)¶

App Data Class: Represents TBA Mobile App Information.

latest_app_version¶

The Latest Available App Version on the represented Platform.

Alias: latest

min_app_version¶

The Minimum Supported App Version on the represented Platform.

Alias: minimum, min

Team¶

class tbapi.Team(json_array, parser, options=None)¶

Team Data Class: Provides information regarding a given team.

key¶

Team Key of the represented team.

team_number¶

Team Number of the represented team.

Alias: number

nickname¶

Nickname of the represented team.

Alias: nick

name¶

Full Name of the represented team

rookie_year¶

Rookie Year of the represented team

motto¶

Motto of the represented team

website¶

Website URL for the represented team

address¶

Address of the represented team.

city¶

Home City of the represented team.

state_prov¶

State or Province of the represented team.

Alias: state, province

country¶

Home Country of the represented team.

postal_code¶

Postal Code of the represented team.

location_name¶

Name of the location of the represented team.

lat¶

Latitude of the represented team.

Alias: latitude

lng¶

Longitude of the represented team.

Alias: longitude

home_championship¶

Dictionary sorted by year containing the home championship of the represented team.

gmaps_place_id¶

Place ID of the represented team as registered in Google Maps.

gmaps_url¶

A URL representing the location of the represented team in Google Maps.

District¶

class tbapi.District(json_array, parser, options=None)¶

District Data Class: Provides information regarding a given district.

key¶

The key of the represented district.

year¶

The year of operation of the represented district.

display_name¶

A string representing a human readable name for the represented district.

abbreviation¶

A string representing a simple abbreviation of the represented district’s name.

Robot¶

class tbapi.Robot(json_array, parser, options=None)¶

Robot Data Class: Provides information about a robot belonging to a team in a given year.

key¶

The key of the represented robot.

robot_name¶

The name of the represented robot.

name¶

The name of the represented robot.

team_key¶

The team_key of the team that owns the represented robot.

team¶

Team: The Team that owns the represented robot.

team_number¶

The team_number of the team that owns the represented robot.

year¶

The year in which the represented robot was built and competed.

Media¶

class tbapi.Media(json_array, parser, options=None)¶

Media Data Class: Represents a team’s presense on a social media platform.

details¶

Details about the represented Social Media Presense.

foreign_key¶

Foreign Key for the represented Social Media Presense.

key¶

Foreign Key for the represented Social Media Presense.

preferred¶

Whether or not the given Social Media Presense is “preferred” by its Team.

type¶

The type of Social Media Presense represented.

Event¶

class tbapi.Event(json_array, parser, options=None)¶

Event Data Class: Represents a given Event and it’s corresponding data.

key¶

The key for the represented event.

event_code¶

The event code for the represented event.

code¶

The event code for the represented event.

year¶

The year in which the represented event takes place.

week¶

The event week in which the represented event takes place.

name¶

The name of the represented event.

short_name¶

The short name of the represented event.

event_type¶

The type of the represented event.

event_type_string¶

A string representing the type of the represented event.

start_date¶

The starting date of the represented event.

start¶

The starting date of the represented event.

end_date¶

The ending date of the represented event.

end¶

The ending date of the represented event.

webcasts¶

DataList: A DataList of Webcast objects for the represented event.

website¶

The Website for the represented event.

district¶

District: The District in which the represented event takes place, if available.

location_name¶

The name of the location at which the represented event takes place.

lat¶

A float representing the latitude of the represented event’s venue.

latitude¶

A float representing the latitude of the represented event’s venue.

lng¶

A float representing the latitude of the represented event’s venue.

longitude¶

A float representing the longitude of the represented event’s venue.

address¶

The address of the venue of the represented event.

city¶

The city of the venue of the represented event.

state_prov¶

The state or province of the venue of the represented event.

state¶

The state or province of the venue of the represented event.

province¶

The state or province of the venue of the represented event.

country¶

The country of the venue of the represented event.

postal_code¶

The postal code of the venue of the represented event.

timezone¶

The timezone of the venue of the represented event.

gmaps_place_id¶

The google maps place id of the venue of the represented event.

gmaps_url¶

The google maps url of the venue of the represented event.

first_event_id¶

I have no idea what this does.

TeamAlliance: Basic information about the associated team’s playoff alliance, if available.

String representing the alliance status of the associated team.

A string representation of a team’s status in the playoffs of the represented event.

Playoff¶

class tbapi.Playoff(json_array, parser, options=None)¶

Playoff Data Class: Represents a team’s status in the playoffs of a given Event.

Record: The team’s WLT Record at the current level.

Alias: level_record

current_level¶

The current level at which the team is competing within the playoffs.

Alias: level

playoff_average¶

The average of the represented team during the playoffs.

Alias: average

record¶

The Team’s WLT Record in the playoffs.

status¶

The Team’s Status in the Playoffs

qual¶

Quals: A team’s status in the qualification rounds of the given event.

Alias: quals

Quals¶

class tbapi.Quals(json_array, parser, options=None)¶

Quals Data Class: Represents a team’s status in the qualification rounds at a given event.

num_teams¶

The number of teams that participated in the qualification rounds at a given event.

ranking¶

Ranking: A representation of a team’s Qualifications Ranking and the data used to calculate it.

Quals Ranking¶

class tbapi.QualsRanking(json_array, parser, options=None)¶

QualsRanking Data Class: Represents a team’s rank in the qualification rounds at a given event.

rank¶

A Team’s rank at a given event.

record¶

Record: A Team’s WLT Record in the qualification rounds at a given event.

qual_average¶

The Average of a team in the qualification rounds.

Record¶

class tbapi.Record(json_array, parser, options=None)¶

Record Data Class: Represents a team’s Win Loss Tie record at a given event or in a given level of an event.

wins¶

The number of won matches played by a given team in the represented level.

Alias: win, won

losses¶

The number of lost matches played by a given team in the represented level.

Alias: loss, lose, lost

ties¶

The number of won matches played by a given team in the represented level.

Alias: tie, tied

string¶

A String Representation of the given record in the W-L-T format.

The Channel of the represented Webcast.

The Date of the represented Webcast.

file¶

The File of the represented Webcast.

Alliance¶

class tbapi.Alliance(json_array, parser, options=None)¶

Alliance Data Class: Represents an Alliance that participated in a given Match.

The score earned by the represented Alliance in a given Match.

A list of team keys representing the teams that participated on the represented Alliance.

teams¶

DataList: A list of Team objects that participated on the represented Alliance.

surrogate_team_keys¶

A list of team keys representing teams that acted as surrogates on the represented Allliance.

surrogate_teams¶

DataList: A list of Team objects that acted as surrogates on the represented Allliance.

Alias: surrogates

Team Alliance¶

TeamAlliance Class: Represents a Team’s Association to a given Alliance.

Backup: Information on Backup Swaps involving the associated team.

The name of the given Alliance.

number¶

The number of the given Alliance.

pick¶

The pick number of the given Alliance.

pick_position¶

The pick number of the given Alliance.

Backup¶

class tbapi.Backup(json_array, parser, options=None)¶

Backup Data Class: Information on Backup Swaps involving a given Team on a given Alliance at a given Event.

team_in¶

The Team that joined the Alliance.

team_out¶

The Team that left the Alliance (in terms of playing).

Breakdown¶

class tbapi.Breakdown(json_array, parser, options=None)¶

Breakdown Class: Provides access to Fluid Match Statistics for a given Alliance in a given Match.

Each FIRST Robotics Competition Game gathers different statistics that are related to it’s gameplay. This class provides access to these “Fluid” keys for use in your software.

get(key)¶

Get the statistic associated with a provided fluid key from the internal data dictionary based on it’s reference name.

Raises a FluidKeyError if the fluid key is not available in this Breakdown object.

list¶

A list of fluid keys that are represented by this Breakdown object.

Breakdown Set¶

class tbapi.BreakdownSet(json_array, parser, options=None)¶

BreakdownSet Data Class: Wrapper for Breakdowns for a given Match.

red¶

Breakdown for the red Alliance for a given Match.

Alias: r

blue¶

Breakdown for the blue Alliance for a given Match.

Alias: b

Match¶

class tbapi.Match(json_array, parser, options=None)¶

Match Data Class: Represents a match at a given event and its corresponding data.

key¶

The Match Key for the given match. Includes event_key as a Substring.

event_key¶

The Event Key of the Event at which the given match was played.

comp_level¶

The Competition Level at which the given Match was played. (qm, qf, sf, f, etc.)

level¶

The Competition Level at which the given Match was played. (qm, qf, sf, f, etc.)

match_number¶

The ID number of the given Match

number¶

The ID number of the given Match

set_number¶

The ID number of the given Match in the current Match set.

raw_time¶

A Unix-Time representation of the Match Time.

time¶

A Datetime representation of the Match Time.

raw_predicted_time¶

A Unix-Time representation of the Scheduled Match Time.

predicted_time¶

A Datetime representation of the Scheduled Match Time.

raw_post_time¶

A Unix-Time representation of the Score Post Time.

raw_post_result_time¶

A Unix-Time representation of the Score Post Time.

post_time¶

A Datetime representation of the Score Post Time.

post_result_time¶

A Datetime representation of the Score Post Time.

videos¶

A DataList of Videos showing the given Match.

winning_alliance¶

A String representing the color of the winning alliance.

alliances¶

A Wrapper containing both alliances that participated in the represented match.

red_alliance¶

The red Alliance that participated in the represented match.

blue_alliance¶

The red Alliance that participated in the represented match.

teams¶

DataList: A list of Team objects that participated in the represented match, independant of alliance.

score_breakdown¶

BreakdownSet: Fluid Statistics regarding the represented match.

Alias: breakdown

The name of the represented Award.

An Integer representing the type of represented Award.

An Integer representing the type of represented Award.

The key for the Event at which the Award was given.

event¶

Event: The Event at which the Award was given.

recipient_list¶

A list of Recipients to which the represented award was presented.

Recipient¶

class tbapi.Recipient(json_array, parser, options=None)¶

Recipient Data Class: Represents the Recipient of an Award given at a defined Event.

The key of the Recipient Team

team¶

Team: The Recipient Team

awardee¶

The Individual Person to who’m the award was presented.

Exceptions¶

EmptyError¶

class tbapi.EmptyError¶

EXCEPTION: Data Class is EMPTY.

ParseError¶

class tbapi.ParseError¶

EXCEPTION: Data Class errored during data parsing.

KeyInputError¶

class tbapi.KeyInputError¶

EXCEPTION: Inpropper Key passed during data parsing.

OfflineError¶

class tbapi.OfflineError¶

EXCEPTION: Network Conenction to The Blue Alliance is Offline.

FluidKeyError¶

class tbapi.FluidKeyError¶

EXCEPTION: Fluid Key not available
